entry.title: $1735 // Renovated 1BD in a well maintained building in Jackson Heights
entry.content:
Just around the corner from the 7 train, 82nd Street station.

Large windows provide natural light. Corner bedroom can fit a queen size bed and a dresser. Generous living room. Windowed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. Tiled bathroom with window.

Hardwood floors throughout, high ceilings, good closet space.

Jackson Heights, a Queens enclave of handsome multifamily dwellings in the Tudor and French Chateau styles along tree-lined streets. Its many shopping thoroughfares are teeming with inexpensive restaurants catering to the working classes of many ethnicities there is no better place to sharpen your international food acumen. Studded throughout with easily accessible public transit, this under-the-radar neighborhood awaits you and yours.
Contact me for a viewing asap!
